body_html:
I have some problems to interpret the timelines (an in depth tutorial would be awsome! see #17076 and #1824 -> @prb12 ):

A problem could be:
first_1 is allocated at the same time as total_0. (in timeline_double)
But its only 145 MB so it shouldn't really matter.

And the execution of third_0 at device:GPU:0/stream:all is at the same time as first_1 of job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0.
Not sure what device:GPU:0/stream:all and job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 are, seems to be both on the GPU?

timeline.zip

body:
I have some problems to interpret the timelines (an in depth tutorial would be awsome! see #17076 and #1824 -> @prb12 ):

A problem could be:
first_1 is allocated at the same time as total_0. (in timeline_double)
But its only 145 MB so it shouldn't really matter. 

And the execution of third_0  at device:GPU:0/stream:all is at the same time as first_1 of  job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0. 
Not sure what  device:GPU:0/stream:all  and job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 are, seems to be both on the GPU?

![timeline](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1831252/36341421-4ebef0de-13ee-11e8-8166-477b6326b4e8.png)


[timeline.zip](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1733678/timeline.zip)
